setColumnRemarks.remarks: To be removed. RPA have just confirmed that SFI-23 and SFI-EO statements will not be issued, which has now introduced some technical debt to remove this.

Example Output: 1 Source: DWH | D365 Used on Statement? No. Used as a primary key to join data
Example Output: PY1234567 Source: DWH | D365 Used on Statement? Yes. Displayed in the Payment Summary section, and used on remittance and bank statements
Example Output: 2024 Source: DWH | D365 Used on Statement? Yes. Used in the statement heading to show the marketing year of payment
Example Output: 987654321 Source: DWH | D365 Used on Statement? No. ID of calculation details and used to join data.
Example Output: Q4-24 Source: DWH | D365 Used on Statement? No, but could be used for schedules in the future
Example Output: 2024-01-31 Source: DWH | D365 Used on Statement? Yes, in the Payment Summary and opening details. This is the date of the payment.
Example Output: 2024-01-31 Source: Documents Used on Statement? No. Used in logic to determine if a statement has been generated
Example Output: 1 Source: DWH | DAX Used on Statement? No, Required as the primary key
